name: CWE-489: Avoid debug code in the production system (PHP)
description: The usage of certain PHP features indicate leftover debug code. This code should be removed when using the application in production to avoid unintended information leakage or entry points for attackers.
output:
This report lists all artifacts that still has debug code. 
This QR provides the following information:
Artifact Full Name

qualityStandards.name: Leftover Debug Code
qualityStandards.description: The application can be deployed with active debugging code that can create unintended entry points.
